title: Beneath the Violent Sea
description: In the black waters of the deep, a siren lies in wait. The Captain of King Srang is retired, but his ship still sails, and she is bent on finding him. Disfigured and vengeful, she stalks the ship until it leads her inland and with a deathly beautiful song, she lures them to sea. For weeks, she ravages the lakeside villages, until she finds him. The one who left the scars in her skin.Beneath the Violent Sea is a dark book of poetry that will leave you chilled and wanting more.
author: Stephanie Dunham
